## Discussion

The notification object is the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorList] object that changed. This notification does not contain a `userInfo` dictionary.

# didChangeNotification

**Type Property**

Posted whenever a color list changes.

## Declaration

```swift
class let didChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

The notification object is the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorList] object that changed. This notification does not contain a `userInfo` dictionary.
title: didChangeNotification
